hero.headline: Gentle Care for Every Smile
hero.subheadline: Comprehensive family dentistry in Seattle's Ballard neighborhood. From first teeth to full restorations, we make every visit comfortable — because your dental health shouldn't feel like a chore.

services.headline: Our Services
services.subheadline: From preventive cleanings to advanced restorations, we provide complete dental care for patients of all ages under one roof.

items.title: Cleanings & Exams
items.description: Thorough professional cleanings, digital X-rays, and comprehensive oral exams. We focus on prevention so you spend less time in the chair long-term.

items.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
items.description: Professional whitening, porcelain veneers, bonding, and smile makeovers. See your results in advance with our digital smile design technology.

items.title: Orthodontics
items.description: Clear aligners and traditional braces for teens and adults. Complimentary consultations with 3D treatment planning and flexible payment options.

items.title: Dental Implants
items.description: Single tooth replacements, implant-supported bridges, and full-arch restorations. Placed and restored in-house — no referral to a separate surgeon needed.

items.title: Emergency Care
items.description: Same-day appointments for toothaches, broken teeth, lost crowns, and dental trauma. Call our emergency line and we'll fit you in within hours.

items.title: Pediatric Dentistry
items.description: Gentle, patient care designed for kids ages 1 through 17. Our kid-friendly operatories and staff make first dental visits something to look forward to.

team.headline: Meet Your Care Team
team.subheadline: Our team combines decades of clinical experience with a genuine commitment to making dental care comfortable and accessible.

members.name: Dr. Lisa Nakamura, DDS
members.title: Founder & Lead Dentist
members.bio: University of Washington School of Dentistry. 20 years of experience in family and cosmetic dentistry. Fellow of the Academy of General Dentistry. Known for her calm demeanor and meticulous attention to detail.

members.name: Dr. James Okafor, DMD
members.title: Associate Dentist
members.bio: OHSU School of Dentistry. Specializes in implant placement and orthodontics. Completed advanced implant training at the Kois Center. Fluent in English and Igbo.

members.name: Dr. Priya Sharma, DDS
members.title: Pediatric Dentist
members.bio: Tufts University School of Dental Medicine with pediatric residency at Seattle Children's. Board-certified pediatric dentist who genuinely loves working with kids and anxious patients.

members.name: Hannah Reeves, RDH
members.title: Lead Dental Hygienist
members.bio: 15 years of clinical experience with certification in laser therapy and periodontal treatment. Patients appreciate her thoroughness and gentle touch.

items.quote: I avoided the dentist for six years because of anxiety. Dr. Nakamura talked me through every step, never rushed, and made me feel like a human, not a number. I actually look forward to my cleanings now.
Dr. Sharma is the reason my daughter asks when her next dentist appointment is. She turned what used to be tears and meltdowns into something my kid genuinely enjoys.
Had a crown come off on a Saturday morning. Called their emergency line, and Dr. Okafor had me in the chair within two hours. Re-cemented and out the door. Outstanding responsiveness.
The clear aligner treatment Dr. Okafor recommended straightened my teeth in 8 months. The digital preview sold me — I could see the end result before I started. Worth every penny.

items.question: Are you accepting new patients?
items.answer: Yes! We welcome new patients of all ages. Your first visit includes a comprehensive exam, digital X-rays, and a cleaning. We'll create a personalized treatment plan and walk you through everything before any work begins.

items.question: What insurance do you accept?
items.answer: We accept most major dental insurance plans including Delta Dental, Premera, Cigna, Aetna, MetLife, and Guardian. We also offer an in-house membership plan for uninsured patients that covers two cleanings, exams, and X-rays per year plus 20% off all treatments.

items.question: Do you offer sedation for anxious patients?
items.answer: Yes. We offer nitrous oxide (laughing gas) for mild anxiety and oral conscious sedation for patients who need more support. Dr. Nakamura has extensive training in sedation dentistry. We'll discuss your options during your consultation.

items.question: What should I expect at my first appointment?
items.answer: Plan for about 90 minutes. We'll take digital X-rays, perform a thorough exam, complete a professional cleaning, and discuss any findings with you. We believe in informed consent — no treatment starts until you understand the what, why, and cost.

items.question: Do you handle dental emergencies?
items.answer: Absolutely. We reserve same-day slots for emergencies. Call our main number and select the emergency option. For after-hours emergencies, the voicemail provides Dr. Nakamura's direct cell for urgent situations like trauma or severe pain.

items.question: What payment options do you offer?
items.answer: We accept cash, all major credit cards, HSA/FSA accounts, and CareCredit financing. For larger treatments like implants or orthodontics, we offer interest-free payment plans of 6 or 12 months. Our treatment coordinator will walk you through your options.

contact.successMessage: Thank you! Our team will get back to you within one business day.
